document_api_meta.title: Edit Open Collaboration Settings
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API is used to edit a Seller's open collaboration settings. It allows you to enroll your existing product catalog and all future products into an open collaboration plan. It also allows you to turn this setting off at any point. By default, this option is turned off for all Sellers.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: auto_add_product
request_body_param.desc: An object with properties to automatically add products to affiliate open collaboration plans.

request_body_param.name: ^enable
request_body_param.desc: Set to `true` if products are automatically added to affiliate open collaboration plans. The seller can add existing non-affiliate products to open collaboration at one time, and future products are added automatically. Set to `false` if otherwise.

request_body_param.name: ^commission_rate
request_body_param.desc: The commission rate in hundredths of a percent. For example, `3587` is a commission rate of `35.87%`. This value must a minimum of `100` and a maximum of `8000`. Not that setting the `enable` property to `false` overrides this property.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to manage a Seller's TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including creating collaborations, editing collaborations, searching collaborations, approving/rejecting creators, finding/adding/removing creators, generating affiliate links, managing affiliate orders and monitoring collaboration activity and performance.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to manage a your TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including creating collaborations, editing collaborations, approving/rejecting creators, finding/adding/removing creators, generating affiliate links, managing affiliate orders and monitoring collaboration activity and performance.
